Learn to design, develop, and publish ap: Apprendre à concevoir, développer et publier des applications pour elementary OS
Get a basic app running, built, and read: Développez, compilez et publier une application basique fonctionnelle en suivant notre Guide de Démarrage.
Learn about the design principles that m: En savoir plus sur les principes de conception fondamentaux des applications elementary OS
Get more info about code style, reportin: Get more info about code style, reporting issues, and proposing design changes.
Freya brings a new API for Switchboard,: Freya brings a new API for Switchboard, searchable action entries in Slingshot, new widgets like HeaderBar, animations in the toolkit, improved CSS theming and more. Build feature-full apps easier than ever with Gtk 3.14 & Vala 0.30
A desktop-wide extension service that al: A desktop-wide extension service that allows apps to use functionality exposed by other apps — without prior coordination.
The foundation library for elementary OS: La bibliothèque d'applications de la fondation Elementary OS. Fourni de puissants widgets comme DynamicNotebook, utilitaires, fonctions commodes et plus.
Simple, flexible database management. Su: Gestion de base de données simple et flexible. Supporte les bases de données SQL distantes et locales, y compris SQLite. Fourni avec navigateur de données graphique, un extracteur de metadata orienté objet, et plus encore.
An HTTP client/server library with synch: An HTTP client/server library with synchronous and async APIs. Comes with SSL/TLS, cookies, caching, WebSockets, proxy and tunneling support, and more. Goes great with JSON-GLib.
Vala. A Modern, Fast, Open Source Langua: Vala. Un langage rapide, moderne et open-source.
Write fast, native, object-oriented code: Write fast, native, object-oriented code with Vala. It's familiar to anyone who's seen C#, but maintains API/ABI compatibility with standard C, has low memory requirements, and is purpose-built for GObject. You name it, Vala's got it: signals, properties, generics, lambda functions, assisted memory management, exception handling, type inference, async/yield, and more.
Develop Apps for elementary OS: Développez des applications pour elementary OS
